title: Data Ownership
description: Empowers individuals to fully control and manage their personal health records (PHRs) within a secure, decentralized network, ensuring privacy and ownership.

title: Decentralized AI
description: Transforms healthcare infrastructure with a lightweight, secure, and scalable peer-to-peer federated learning (FL) network for training AI models on encrypted data.

title: Direct Rewards
description: Enables peer-to-peer data monetization, allowing individuals to earn high-frequency stablecoin rewards without intermediaries.
